content: 6 slip_stitch in next chain-3 space chain 1 3 single_crochet in same space 3 single_crochet in each chain-3 space around join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 48 single_crochet round 7 chain 3 skip 1 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch in next single_crochet around join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet slip_stitch in next chain-3 loop to move hook to correct position to begin round 8 16 chain-3 loops auto-color change round 8 chain 1 single_crochet in same space chain 3 single_crochet in next chain-3 loop twice chain 3 v-st in next chain-3 loop for corner * chain 3 single_crochet in next chain-3 loop 3 times chain 3 v-st in next chain-3 loop for corner* repeat between * * twice more chain 3 join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 16 chain-3 loops & 4 v-sts at corners round 9 chain 1 single_crochet in same space chain 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet twice chain 3 single_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in next chain- 2 space for corner *single_crochet in next double_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 3 twice single_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in next chain-2 space for corner* repeat between * * twice more single_crochet in next double_crochet chain 3 join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet fasten_off remaining motifs work as per rnds 1-8 of 1st motif to join to an adjacent motif work round 9 in the join-as-you-go method join-as-you-go round 9 chain 1 single_crochet in same space chain 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet twice chain 3 single_crochet in next double_crochet… work joins at corners and along sides as needed some squares will be joined along 1 side only some squares along 2 sides work an additional slip_stitch join when needed at the corners where 4 squares are meeting to prevent any gaps to join at a corner replace the single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet corner with single_crochet chain 1 slip_stitch in adjacent corner s chain 1 single_crochet again in same space as 1st single_crochet to join along the sides replace the chain-3 loop with chain 1 slip_stitch in adjacent chain-3 loop chain 1 fasten_off weave in ends optional edging this blanket will look lovely with an edging added you may wish to work a round of single_crochet around all 4 sides of the blanket to create a nice foundation for any additional edging you would like to work i often like to work a ribbed edging this will give a nice structure and great finished look to the blanket and will also add a few more inches to the finished dimensions copyright this pattern may be printed for your personal use only you may not in any form reproduce transmit or distribute this pattern including but not limited to images diagrams and text through any venue including but not limited to photocopying other electrical or mechanical means
